title: Thoughts On the New Arcade Fire (The Lightning I & II)

media:group.media:title: Thoughts On the New Arcade Fire (The Lightning I & II)
media:group.media:description:
► Here's a quick video in which I discuss my thoughts on the new 2-part Arcade Fire song, Lightning I & II. Following 2017's controversial Everything Now, fans were unsure of the direction the band would go in. Now, a new record entitled "WE" is slated for a May 6th, 2022 release. On March 17th, this new track dropped and here are my brief thoughts.

► Leave a like if you enjoyed! Also, subscribe to the channel!
